meanings.definition: The quality or state of being redolent.
meanings.sent1: The redolency of the flowers filled the room with a sweet scent.
meanings.sent2: I love the redolency of freshly baked cookies.
meanings.sent3: The redolency of the perfume was so strong, it made everyone sneeze.
meanings.sent4: The redolency of nostalgia brought tears to her eyes.
meanings.sent5: The redolency of the pine forest was like a comforting hug.

meanings.sent1: The redolency of the roses in the garden was delightful.
meanings.sent2: She followed the redolency of the delicious barbecue.
meanings.sent3: The redolency of the bakery made his mouth water.
meanings.sent4: The redolency of the ocean breeze was invigorating.
meanings.sent5: The redolency of the fresh laundry was calming after a long day.

meanings.definition: The power of evoking memories or emotions.
meanings.sent1: The redolency of the old song brought back memories of childhood.
meanings.sent2: The redolency of the campfire reminded him of summer nights.
meanings.sent3: The redolency of the movie made her laugh uncontrollably.
meanings.sent4: The redolency of the painting stirred deep emotions within him.
meanings.sent5: The redolency of her grandmother's cooking filled her with warmth and love.
